meanings.sent2: She preferred her undotted notebook for sketching.
meanings.sent3: The undotted map confused the travelers.
meanings.sent4: His undotted path led him to unexpected places.
meanings.sent5: The undotted sky was clear and vast.

meanings.sent2: The undotted dice were hard to read.
meanings.sent3: The undotted dice played a trick on the players.
meanings.sent4: Her undotted thoughts were scattered and unclear.
meanings.sent5: The undotted road stretched out endlessly before them.
